1. Installing PyD1Â¶

PyD1 is in the early stages of development and will likely change significantly over time. As such, it should be considered experimental.

Use it at your own risk of frustration.

To install in your HOME:

python setup.py install --home=~

To install in the default system location:

sudo python setup.py install
